snippet.title: [サテラビュー] ワリオの森 イベント バージョン VER 2 | Wario no Mori Event Version (Version 2)
snippet.description:
(EDIT: SOUND FIXED!)

So, finally, after a long wait, and thanks to Johnnyboy (https://twitter.com/johnny_boy1985 on Twitter), this was recovered! 

It looks to be the special "Bakushow Mondai" version of Wario's Woods, but... Version 2? What does that entail? Is it a revision? How peculiar! ANY MORE INFORMATION ON THIS WOULD BE APPRECIATED.

The original "Wario no Mori Bakusho Ban" was among the first Satellaview broadcasts. Needless to say, even if this appears to be a variant of some kind, this is a milestone in Satellaview preservation!

Among the differences in this version; there is a distinct "event" and "time race" mode. The normal rounds and VS. CPU modes appear to be absent. The game saves - likely for scorekeeping purposes, as being an event game it was surely used to distribute prizes - and there are options for turning Radio on/of for the Soundlink broadcast.

I WILL LIVESTREAM MORE OF THIS LATER. STAY TUNED!
